Drug Name: Meningococcal (Groups A   C   Y and W-135) Diphtheria Conjugate Vaccine

meningococcal meningitis prophylaxis: haemophilus b conjugate (prp-t) vaccine / meningococcal conjugate vaccine

More common:: general feeling of discomfort or illness
hard lump at the injection site
pain, redness, or swelling at the injection site
